caption: ✨ Life is all about balance! Whether it’s crushing deadlines at work or unwinding with your favorite hobby, finding your rhythm is key. What's your favorite way to recharge after a busy week? Share in the comments! ⬇️ Let's inspire each other to live our best lives! 💪🌿 #WorkLifeBalance #SelfCareSundays

avatar_data.prompt: A realistic portrait photo of a 25-35 year old person, friendly, professional, engaging personality, professional headshot quality, studio lighting, high resolution, photorealistic, detailed facial features, natural expression, suitable for social media profile, modern style

media_prompt: A lifestyle social media post image, featuring the same person from the avatar, related to: ✨ Life is all about balance! Whether it’s crushing deadlines at work or unwinding with your favorite, high quality, professional, Instagram-worthy, bright and engaging, modern aesthetic
